page.title: 04 LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Two of the things I do in my spare time are{dancing}and{Guides. }I have two dancing lessons a week, one on Tuesday and one on Saturday. I have my lesson at{The Civic Centre.} We are practising for our show, which we do every year. I especially like the costumes we wear. My favourite dance is a rock and roll dance. On Saturday I practise for my exams. {Guides}is very interesting and we enjoy ourselves. We play{rounders}and many other{games.} This is also on a Tuesday, it lasts from 7.30-9.00 p.m. and we also go camping. We somtimes draw and play with balls and{act {plays. }We enjoy{mimes}and plays and we like having Christmas and Summer Fairs, we especially like the ploughmans lunches and cakes we have at them. At the end of a meeting we sing{Taps,}a special guide song.
